metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3631 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: The (1) cpStrips and (2) cpTiles functions in the thumbnail tool in LibTIFF 4.0.6 and earlier allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via vectors related to the bytecounts[] array variable.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream removed the thumbnail utility in 4.0.7 we will not be fixing this minor issue, marking as ignored

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
